summary: This code configures the Docker daemon service. It specifies the description, sets the executable start command with registry mirror, and adds it to the multi-user target installation.

details.comment: This code configures the Docker daemon service. It specifies the description, sets the executable start command with registry mirror, and adds it to the multi-user target installation.
details.content:
[Unit]
Description=Docker daemon Service.
[Service]
Type=simple
ExecStart=/usr/bin/dockerd --registry-mirror=http://hub-mirror.c.163.com
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
